metadata.title: CVE-2023-22724 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: GLPI is a Free Asset and IT Management Software package. Versions prior to10.0.6 are subject to Cross-site Scripting via malicious RSS feeds. AnAdministrator can import a malicious RSS feed that contains Cross SiteScripting (XSS) payloads inside RSS links. Victims who wish to visit an RSScontent and click on the link will execute the Javascript. This issue ispatched in 10.0.6.

criterions.comment: glpi package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
